name: Gourmet Food Tour
description:
At our "gourmet" tour you will EAT  at 3 of the best four and five star restaurants on 5th Avenue (main street in Playa del Carmen) and try out some of the best dishes we have picked for you.
 
There are over 300 quality restaurants in Playa del Carmen so we have painfully done the research and chose the best ones that will have a wide variety of dishes of Mexican food for you to enjoy.
